name: NSPathCellDelegate
desc: A set of methods that enable the delegate of a path cell object to customize the Open panel or pop-up menu of a path whose style is set to NSPathControl.Style.popUp.

items.name: func pathCell(NSPathCell, willDisplay: NSOpenPanel)
items.desc: Implement this method to customize the Open panel shown by a pop-up–style path.

items.name: func pathCell(NSPathCell, willPopUp: NSMenu)
items.desc: Implement this method to customize the menu of a pop-up–style path.
